meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice, (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)
야채와 영양 They say bell peppers are good for your skin.
옷가게에서 What brand do you think is good?
유제품에 관해서 They say yoghurt is good for preventing cancer of the large intestine.
